body_html:
LSTMCell greatly benefits for me with cuDNN. Especially since it has fused pointwise operations and streamed GEMMs. Haven't directly benchmarked RNNCell.

Why would retaining cuDNN compatibility be difficult? Substitute the forward pass for a cuDNN based function if parameters are set to those that cuDNN can handle.
